HTMLVideoElementRequestVideoFrameCallbac.summary: The requestVideoFrameCallback() method of the interface registers a callback function that runs when a new video frame is sent to the compositor. This enables developers to perform efficient operations on each video frame.

remarks.para:
-The video element
-
-Perform efficient per-video-frame operations on video with requestVideoFrameCallback() on developer.chrome.com (2023)

HTMLVideoElementRequestVideoFrameCallbac.returns: A number representing a unique callback ID.This can be passed to to cancel the callback registration.
